sections.details: Supplier to design and implement a greenfield microservices backend for Project Orion, including authentication, billing integration, and observability.
Invoices will be submitted monthly. Time-and-materials at $150 per hour with an NTE of $65,000 for Q1. Overage requires written change order. Payment terms are Net 30.
This agreement is governed by the laws of the State of California. All work performed under this agreement is considered confidential and the intellectual property of Global Innovations Corp.
